Name: AkaWallet
Text: Start exploring blockchain applications in seconds. Trusted by over 1 million users worldwide

Name: AkaSafe
Text: AkaSafe wallet is a secure, decentralized, easy-to-use, and free application to manage more than 10,000 cryptocurrencies.

Name: AkaMask
Text: AkaMask is a decentralized multi-chain digital wallet, dedicated to providing safe and convenient one-stop digital asset management services to users around the world.
